document.full_text: the u.s. hispanic population has passed the 50 million mark for the first time, the census bureau said on thursday, with most growth over the last decade driven by latinos.
document.title: u.s. latinos top 50 million in population
lines_and_colors: the u.s. hispanic population has passed the 50 million mark for the first time, the census bureau said on thursday, with most growth over the last decade driven by latinos.
